author: Jeff Zeleny, Chief National Affairs Correspondent
title: Biden makes decision on Supreme Court nominee, with announcement as soon as Friday
description: President Joe Biden has reached a decision on his first nominee to the Supreme Court, people familiar with the selection said Thursday, with his historic selection of the first Black woman to serve on the nation's highest court set to be revealed as soon as F…
